content:
Wed, 15.12.2021 Telco HL7.ch FHIR Work Group, 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM

Agenda:

  • Ballots

    • Revised timetable for 2nd Ballot 2021
      * 31.12.2021 publication CH EPR mHealth (only informative ballot)
      * 15.01.2022 publication of result of voting procedure, start of objection period for CH EMED, VACD and AllergyIntolerance
      * 31.01.2022 publication of result of voting procedure, start of objection period for CH ORF, RAD-Order, LAB-Order and eTOC
    • The ci-build is used for the objection period.
    • CH ORF (CH eTOC)
      * Fundamental question: Do all attributes from the Quesionnaire have to be mapped into Resources?
      * CH eTOC Issue #10 and CH ORF Issue #83
      * Discussion for a motion to reaffirm that the sender/filler is responsible for providing the data according to the IPS as it is defined in the eTOC Implementation Guide
    • Any other open issues to discuss?

  • CH Core STU3

    • Overview Issues
    • Suggest to include Swiss consent code in CH Core and not in HL7 ValueSet. #39

  • Next Telcos

    • Wed, 5.01.2022, 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
    • Wed, 19.01.2022, 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
    • Wed, 2.2.2022, 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
    • Wed, 16.2.2022, 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
    • TC Meeting Save the Date 21.6.2022

Google Meet:
**Join the video meeting**
Otherwise, to join by phone, dial +41 43 430 96 52 and enter this PIN: 270 847 803# (view more phone numbers)
